Title: A note on doubly nonlinear SPDEs with singular drift in divergence form
Source: Att Aca Naz Lincei Cl Sci Fis Mat Nat Rend Lincei Mat Appl
Abstract: © 2018 European Mathematical Society Publishing House. All Rights Reserved. We prove well-posedness for a class of second-order SPDEs with multiplicative Wiener noise and doubly nonlinear drift of the form div gð‘Þ þ bðÞ, where g is the subdi¤erential of a convex function on R d and b is a maximal monotone graph everywhere defined on R, on which neither growth nor continuity assumptions are imposed.
